job description:
We are looking for an experienced Director of Data Science to lead the Company’s Data Science team. You will play a leadership role interacting with other Tubi executives on a weekly basis helping translate business problems into an analytical framework. You will also be expected to champion the use of data-driven decision making, own the Data Science Roadmap, improve on existing processes, provide thought leadership, and partner closely with the ML and Engineering teams. This role will need a high level of experience leading teams and communicating effectively with other stakeholders throughout the business.

Some of the tasks your team will tackle include A/B testing, product and marketing analytics, predictive modeling, customer profiling and segmentation, data visualization, and tracking LTV. You will also be able to lead the charge recruiting, analyzing, and hiring key members of the team while working closely with the recruiting team.

Required Skills:

MSc or PhD(Preferred) in Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Physics or related field
6+ years of industry experience in a data related role
4+ years of experience writing scalable code
Experience leading high performing Data Science teams
Hands on experience with at least two of the following areas: recommender systems, reinforcement learning, contextual bandits, RNNs (LSTM, GRU, etc), non-linear optimization, learning to rank
Ability to easily go from idea to working prototype in Python and/or Scala.
Previous experience with Apache Spark
Expert in statistics and/or machine learning
